Invocation when getting dressed.ARABIC_TEXT: (الْحَمْدُ للَّهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا (الثَّوْبَ) وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلاَ قُوَّة...)
Invocation when getting dressed.LANGUAGE_ARABIC_TRANSLATED_TEXT: (Alhamdu lillahil-lathee kasanee hatha (aththawb) warazaqaneehi min ghayri hawlin minnee wala quwwah.)
Invocation when getting dressed.TRANSLATED_TEXT: (All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power nor might from myself.)
